description:
Words, illustrations, and images all possess atmospheres. 
Imagine Soundtracks depicts the musical emotions that animations, literature, manga, movies, or video games inspire. This series, curated by Paris-based poet and DJ Clarisse Pr√©vost, aka redkoffee, is presented with interpreted dialogues from the explored selection.

title: Imagine Soundtracks w/ redkoffee
